snippet: The oldest-ever member of the U.S. House has been airlifted to a Texas hospital due to injuries from a car accident, though a spokesman says the congressman is expected to recover....

headline.print_headline: US Rep. Ralph Hall Injured in Texas Car Accident
headline.main: US Rep. Ralph Hall Injured in Texas Car Accident

lead_paragraph: The oldest-ever member of the U.S. House has been airlifted to a Texas hospital due to injuries from a car accident, though a spokesman says the congressman is expected to recover.
